message: Just came across this video that I think is #1 creative and interesting to watch, #2 a good way to show the ROI of User Experience. I know it really focuses on websites in the discussion, and "pies" in the drawings, but I know it can be applied to other products / interfaces. What do you all think? http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O94kYyzqvTc&feature=player_embedded
